      • splitRegion

        public SplitInfo<GiniSplitCalculator.GiniData> splitRegion(Integer[] s,
                                                           double[] values,
                                                           double[] labels,
                                                           int regionIdx,
                                                           GiniSplitCalculator.GiniData d)
        Calculate split info of best split of region given information about this region.
        Specified by:
        splitRegion in interface ContinuousSplitCalculator<GiniSplitCalculator.GiniData>
        Parameters:
        s - Indexes of samples of this region.
        values - All values of this feature.
        labels - All labels of this feature.
        regionIdx - Index of region being split.
        d - Information about region being split which can be used for computations.
        Returns:
        Information about best split of region with index given by regionIdx.
